translations: （使）丧偶，（使）成为寡妇（或鳏夫）（widow 的过去式及过去分词）

phrs.translation: 离婚的女子；被抛弃的女子

sentences.sentence: Once upon a time, people who lived alone tended to be those on either side of marriage—twentysomething professionals or widowed senior citizens.
sentences.translation: 曾几何时，独自生活的人往往是婚姻中的任意一方——或是包括20多岁的专业人士，或是丧偶的老年人。

sentences.sentence: She was widowed when she was 35.
More and more young men are widowed by cancer.
sentences.translation: 越来越多的男青年被癌症夺去妻子。
